title: Multisig for Beginners
teaser: Why multiple signatures, how thresholds work, and how SKM helps.

why.title: Why Multisig?
why.text: Multiple signatures reduce the risk of individual errors or theft.

singleVsMulti.title: Single-sig vs multisig
singleVsMulti.text: Single-Sig = 1 key is sufficient. Multisig = multiple signatures required (z. B. 2 von 3).

stellarHow.title: How Stellar Implements Multisig
stellarHow.text: Stellar uses signers with weights and thresholds. Each operation requires a threshold weight.

examples.title: Practical examples
examples.item1: Company account: Two team members must sign each payment.
examples.item3: Secure vault: Requires hardware key plus backup key.

skmSupport.title: How SKM Supports Multisig
skmSupport.text: SKM constructs multisig transactions, collects signatures, and stores prepared jobs.
